<title level="1" right="Rules">[Reactions](/Rules.aspx?ID=62)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 17 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Reactions use this symbol: <actions string="Reaction" />. These actions can be used even when it’s not your turn. You get only one reaction per encounter round, and you can use it only when its specific trigger is fulfilled. Often, the trigger is another creature’s action.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
